meanings.definition: A tool with bristles used to groom and style hair.
meanings.sent1: I keep my hairbrushes in a container on my dresser.
meanings.sent2: She bought new hairbrushes to replace her old ones.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy thought the hairbrushes were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like hairbrushes, smoothing out the knots in their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The hairbrushes gleamed under the bright lights of the salon.

meanings.definition: The act of using a hairbrush to detangle or smooth hair.
meanings.sent1: After showering, she always spends time doing her hairbrushes.
meanings.sent2: He watched his sister's hairbrushes routine with fascination.
meanings.sent3: The hairbrushes dance competition was a hit at the talent show.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a gentle stroke of hairbrushes on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hairbrushes against hair was soothing in the quiet room.
